title: Human Connectome — CRN Dynamics
desc: HCP Subject 100206, T2 basal ganglia gating loop. 20 nodes, 152 edges. Interactive κ-slider with pre-computed GKSL trajectories.

title: C. elegans — Touch Withdrawal Circuit
desc: 24 neurons, 41 synapses. Live Lindblad master equation solved in browser — real-time density matrix evolution with adjustable κ, ε, γ.

title: Drosophila Larva — Mushroom Body
desc: L1 larval connectome, PN → KC → MBON circuit. Static CRN transport analysis across the olfactory learning pathway.

title: Mouse Cortex Proxy — Synthetic Benchmark
desc: N=8 chain graph with live GKSL solver. Transport–memory tradeoff in controlled synthetic setting. Not biological data.
